احسب زكاتك مع مؤسسة اترك أثرا: Calculate your zakat with Etruk Athra Foundation
كيف تحسب زكاتك؟ حاسبة الزكاة على موقع مؤ: How do you calculate your zakat? The Zakat Calculator on the Etruk Athra Foundation website enables you to calculate the value of your Zakat after writing the money or the amount you own after achieving the Zakat Nisab. Etruk Athra Foundation disburses your zakat money in the legal zakat banks. * Please contact a legal fatwa agency or house in order to verify the conditions and controls of the due zakat.
